name: CommendAmaryllocameratotakeasnapshot
0:
”Alexa, ask zeus camera take a snapshot kitchen”
”Alexa, ask zeus camera take a photo kitchen”
”Alexa, ask zeus camera snapshot kitchen”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zeus camera
Developer Terms of Use
des: By saying "Alexa, ask Zeus camera take a snapshot kitchen", this will trigger Amaryllo smart home security camera to take a photo in real-time.
